definition: fashionable word or phrase/abbr. for 潮流用語|潮流用语[chao2 liu2 yong4 yu3]

sentences.english: Let's review the trendy expressions and classic stories in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 來一起盤點2009潮語，回顧經典故事吧。

definition: the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
Three Character Classic, 13th century reading primer consisting of Confucian tenets in lines of 3 characters
to compete to be the first to answer a question (as on a quiz show)
understanding and enjoying (a work of art)
dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]

dramatic form consisting of historical narration/history as jocular narrative/to stretch history for a joking story/amusing story with strained interpretations of history/to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
sensationalism/vulgar claptrap to please the crowds/playing to the gallery/demagogy
